title: Excess Expenditure Appropriation (2012) Act, 2015
content:
Excess Expenditure Appropriation
(2012) [No. 10 of 2015 157
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
ACT
No. 10 of 2015
Date of Assent: 14th August, 2015
An Act to approve the excess expenditure of monies
aggregating twelve million, seven hundred and eighty-five
thousand, thirty-nine kwacha.
[ 14th August, 2015
ENACTED by the Parliament of Zambia Enactment
1. This Act may be cited as the The Excess Expenditure Short title
Appropriation (2012) Act, 2015.
2. The expenditure on the services of the Republic during the Appropriation
financial year which ended on 31st December, 2012 of the monies
indicated in respect of the services in the third column of the
Schedule, being expenditure in excess of the monies appropriated
for the services by the Appropriation Act, 2011, and the Act No. 32
of 2011
Supplementary Appropriation (2012) Act, 2014, is approved.
Act No. 5 of
2014
Single copies of this Act may be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka, Price K 2.00 each.
Excess Expenditure Appropriation
158 No. 10 of 2015 ] (2012)
